heroHook: It happened again. Hollis, a sound designer for theater, just lost an entire afternoon's work. Three hours of detailed ChatGPT conversation about cue sheet management — strategic decisions, specific data, carefully crafted context — vanished the moment she started a new chat. If you've ever searched for "how to prevent AI from forgetting", you know exactly how this feels.

howToSteps.name: Optimize ChatGPT native settings
howToSteps.text: Enable Memory, write detailed Custom Instructions, and set up Projects in ChatGPT.
